bibl.title: Myos Hormos - Quseir al-Qadim. Roman and Islamic Ports on the Red Sea. Volume 2: The Finds from the Excavations 1999-2003

bibl.seg: David Peacock & Lucy Blue, Overview: The Trade and Economy of Myos Hormos and Quseir al-Qadim.

David Peacock & Lucy Blue (edd.), assisted by Julian Whitewright, Myos Hormos - Quseir al-Qadim. Roman and Islamic ports on the Red Sea. Volume 2: The Finds from the Excavations 1999-2003 = University of Southampton. Series in Archaeology. 6 = BAR International Series. 2286 (Oxford, 2011) pp. 345-351.

Introduction: The town and port. - 1. Topography. - 2. The harbour, buildings and burial. - 3. Population. - 4. Food and water. - 5. The organisation of trade. - 6. Ships and the objects of trade. - 7. Concluding remarks.
